welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dortmund, a charming city known for its rich industrial history, stunning parks, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Flayva Coffee & Tea Lounge
restaurants.description: Flayva Coffee & Tea Lounge is a café located in Dortmund.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Dortmund Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
